About GreenHostBox

GreenHostBox was established in May 27, 2013 in looking to provide customers with high quality hosting and support. We understand that anything from a small personal blog to a mission-critical business site needs to be accessible and fast 24 hours a day. We continue to expand and grow bigger everyday which is the key of our success. At GreenHostBox, we keep everything at a very affordable price while maintaining our hosting qualities and expectations high. All of our servers uses RAID to maintain your important data with high redundancy and premium tier-1 network for quick loading speeds. No one should pay hefty unnecessary prices for services which is one of the many reasons why our customers choose us. We keep a high uptime promise at 99.9% and if it goes below that, you will get compensated. If you aren't completely satisfied with our hosting we offer a thirty days money back guarantee regardless of reason! You can now try our services worry free!

Our OpenVZ Node's Specification (Minimum)
  • Intel Xeon E3-1245v2
  • SATA 6.0 Gb/s Drives in RAID-10
  • 1Gbps Port
  • Located in Piscataway, New Jersey
  • Datacenter: Dupont Fabros
Why Our Customers Love Us
  • ★ Instant Setup - The second after you order and pay, our billing system automatically creates your account and emails you your hosting account information. No need to wait hours or even days for your account to be created! Even when you want to upgrade or downgrade your plan, you do not have to wait as it does that instantly.
  • ★ Quality Transparent Support - Here at GreenHostBox, we like to keep our customers informed about an issue or update. We always do our best to try to help our customers in need. We don't promote falsely answering our customers and replying back with a single liner.
  • ★ Quality Hosting - We utilize the latest hardware which allows our servers to always be high in performance. You will always receive the high service that you paid for. We hate lagging behind in competition of hosting industries which is why we always strive to offer services to our customers that meets their needs and expectations.
  • ★ High Security - Security is our number one priority which is why we have CloudLinux installed and our server severely hardened. Additionally, Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) are installed and used in our billing system so your sensitive information are encrypted between our servers and your browser. Our high security allows customers to trust us.
  • ★ High Performance - Due to our enterprise hardware and technology, we are able to provide our customers with quick loading speeds so the customer's ever-growing website doesn't fall behind since the #1 reason why visitors leave websites is due to the sluggish of the loading speed.
  • ★ Servers Never Overloaded - We never overload our server to the point where it affects the performance that we promise. We always like to leave plenty of room and whenever a server starts filling up, we deploy a new server so our customers doesn't need to be worried!
  • ★ Always Prepared - We are always prepared for whatever disaster that can occur such as major drive failures. We would be able to restore cPanel and all of our clients' data within hours if all of our data was lost due to drive failures.
  • ★ Off-Site Automatic Backups - We automatically backup your data multiple times every week and transfer them to an off-site location where they are stored safely in case a disaster were to happen. Most hosts don't do this which causes them to be vulnerable and unprepared.
  • ★ Servers Monitored 24/7/365 - If there was a case that one of our servers were to be down or sluggish, we would receive immediate notifications so we can investigate and troubleshoot the problem as quickly as possible so your website has minimal disruptions.
  • ★ Abundance of Addons - We provide abundance of addons installed within cPanel to make our customer's website successful. We have SEO tools, CDN, and much more that's accessible within our cPanel control panel.
  • ★ Price Lock - We are not interested in scamming or deceiving our customers in any way for more money and we will never be. The price of the service you first signed up with will always be what you pay guaranteed.
  • ★ Thirty Days Money Back Guarantee - If you are dissatisfied with our service or even because the sky is blue, we will refund your money if your service was ordered within thirty days. Now with our money back policy, you can try out our services with risk free!
